resources.string: As part of our service, we are the office responsible for the integrity, accuracy and privacy of the official academic record. We can assist you with academic transcripts, degree and enrollment verification, schedule of courses, monitoring the completion of degree requirements and transfer credits
Our staff is currently working remotely Monday-Friday 8:30-4:30
For more information please contact us at 508-286-8247 | registrar@wheatoncollege.edu or visit our website.
